name: <AUTONOMIE>
description:
Autonomie is an interactive experience played through the lens of an android set in the year 2077. The game is currently in development, with its first release set to be 05.03.2022. The experience should take around 10-15 minutes to complete fully.

Humans are just like any other computers, our processors are just more biological, so who’s to say that androids can’t feel the same things that humans do? As we move into a technological world in the future that may include androids as working members of society, their rights deserve to be protected just as any other. Autonomie aims to explore the larger question: Can androids develop emotions? 

Play through the eyes of RUR Unit 227-6, an android of the Environment Protection Legion, as they experience what it's like to gain autonomy over their own thoughts and feelings, as well as the experiences that form those thoughts. 

**Content Warnings: non-graphic assault against main character in Scenes 9 and 10 (noted in the text)
